channel.title: Problems
channel.description: I would like to know how to fix these problems: How to make Spec. Recovers working. How to make Hand Cannon working. How to make Dwarf Cannon work. How to make a TokHaar-Kal cape. Make weapons like Chaotic Maul two handed. Thank you :) [PI]PvPScapez

item.title: Problems
item.dc:creator: @Pkor159 Pkor159
item.description:
@Pkor159 wrote:

Theres no tut’s to make Dwarf and Hand Cannons working. Tok-Harkal I got help unlike here and to make 2handed weapons 2handed there’s no of that. So link me smartypants!

Read full topic

item.title: Problems
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

This isn’t help, these are requests…

  1. Near enough every server should have this already, look around your CombatAssistant / Special attack methods
  2. Look at tutorials
  3. Look at tutorials
  4. Look at tutorials (This is client sided, you need to add the models and ints, then server side you just want to add it to item.cfg and tweak the bonuses)

Read full topic
